lead_paragraph: Mets reliever Ambiorix Burgos was released from a Santo Domingo jail in a case involving two women killed in a car crash. A judge ordered him to pay $57,000 and appear every two weeks before a magistrate until a court date is set.
snippet: Mets reliever Ambiorix Burgos was released from a Santo Domingo jail in a case involving two women killed in a car crash. A judge ordered him to pay $57,000 and appear every two weeks before a magistrate until a court date is set.
